typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Date as string,
		{       Referred} as string,
		{   Geographic Market} as string,
		{ Market Segment} as string,
		{ Line of Business} as string,
		{   Member ID} as string,
		{ Member First Name} as string,
		{   Member Last Name} as string,
		{   DOB} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	moveFiles: ['','IFP_OON_Outreach_Processed']) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
